author: mrmitch
title: Bulk bricks with a few special pieces
review: This set came with another 200 pc LEGO bulk bucket. Idea book is OK but not very usefull to avid LEGO collectors. Good variety of pieces, nothing great as far a color or hard to find items. It does contain the hoses which I've never seen in a bulk bucket. Not bad - Freestyle must - if you like to use your own ideas to create things.
